"Seeking a Benefactor":
"The little shadows of Lillipa... They've
been nothing but a rumor, but I know
they exist. They saved me!

Please, can you go look for them for me?
Even something that just shows they
exist would be enough...

※Will appear while investigating
Matter [D-4] on MB 4."
"砂漠エリアで「存在の痕跡」を見る"
